website_summaries.verdict: Similar to the Singer in many ways, but with a few more quality concerns.
cons: Occasional complaints of inconsistent heat across the bed and warping

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this during April of 2017. By the end of summer, I noticed clothes not quite coming out as crisp as they should. I figured sacrificing the quality (a little) was a reasonable exchange for the time saved from not having to iron. Then, by the first week of November it completely stopped heating. Initial quality was fantastic! There is a noticeable drop off of quality before 5 months passes. By the end of the sixth month it is back to the iron.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it twice and I just pass by my 30 days returned policy like they say you pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: this steamer will heat for 5 minutes and then the plate will come warm and wont work . I turn it off and on again and it will work for another 5 min and the same thing will happen. I have only used it twice and I just pass by my 30 days returned policy like they say you pay for what you get . I just spend 190 for something that doesn't work. will definitely don't buy another one like this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: takes tooooo long to heat up for the steam, ...
customer_reviews.text: takes tooooo long to heat up for the steam, difficult to use especially with larger garments. used it twice went back to the old trusted iron and board
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Sasso

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this press. I bought it as a lightning deal. Shirts are a piece of cake. Pants are a bit tough. I am waiting for another lightning deal so I can buy one for my parents. Size wise it's just right, but you'll need another table or stand for it.
customer_reviews.author: Buysalot

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last a year
customer_reviews.text: Bad wiring the first day I got it and turned it on it sparked then stopped. as time went on Once in while it would spark under the top iron section until one day it just stopped getting hot and sparked up under the top iron section. I was afraid it would start a fire. I wouldn't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: It started smoking on the right side and I know ...
customer_reviews.text: It started smoking on the right side and I know it definitely wasn't steam. Not sure how long its going to work! I threw the box so now I cant send it back:(
customer_reviews.author: Last Danz

customer_reviews.title: Great and fast
customer_reviews.text: Everything fast n covient but I don’t like it’s a board I recommend steamer hand held
customer_reviews.author: Qman

customer_reviews.title: A very good home steam press.
customer_reviews.text: Pyle PSTMP95 does what it is supposed to do. Easy to use. Presses clean lines. Good steam output. And actually fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gene L. Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this device. Have used 3 times for multiple items. Better on shirts than pants.
customer_reviews.author: Deepsouth

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Just watch your fingers and hands so you ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just watch your fingers and hands so you don't get burned.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it all the time for his t shirts
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: cuts down on time ironing a large amount of clothes in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Washington

customer_reviews.title: It was fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for, easy to set up and use. I would recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: pam ricks

customer_reviews.title: Hot stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and does a great job. I am having some trouble with my fitted blouses but I think some of it is just learning how to do them. Most videos that show how to use a steam press show t-shirts, linens and pants. Love it for pressing my pants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pants!
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing a lot of clothing that required ironing. Although I'm not too bad with the traditional standard iron, I decided pants were more difficult to iron than pants were. I absolutely love the convenience of using this steam press with my pants. I have a specific pair of pants that I love (cotton but it's weaved so that it is very nice looking when properly ironed as it gets completely "pressed") and only this steam press can help me get the perfect crease!
customer_reviews.author: A. Tran

customer_reviews.title: This functions fine and delivers good steam
customer_reviews.text: This functions fine and delivers good steam, I just found it difficult to coordinate our lab coats, the weight of the fabric tends to move it over the board before I could close the top and I ended up with creases where I didn't want them. For pants it was much better. I returned it and purchased a traditional steam iron instead, I never really minded ironing, I just thought the board press would be faster, but it wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lartin, DDS

customer_reviews.title: Almost caught fire
customer_reviews.text: This product worked fine for me a few months ago. I am disappointed to say that I attempted to use it today and thankfully, I did not leave it uunattended. After setting it for cottons I pressed a 1 yard piece of fabric and the unit started smoking on the left front side. Quickly I unplugged it and crossed my fingers that it would not ignite. If I would have left the room, it would have. It had only been plugged in for about 5 to 6 minutes. I will try to return it and purchase a different brand since it seems that the quality of the unit is not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: gimmegoodstuff

customer_reviews.title: My extended coverage was useless as it stipulates they will not cover problems if ...
customer_reviews.text: Malfunctioned and caught on fire after the 1 year warranty expired. My extended coverage was useless as it stipulates they will not cover problems if the unit is not plugged into a surge protector and they immediately attributed my problems to a power surge and would not consider normal wear and tear or possible manufacturing problems. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great at first and saved me time and money. Fast forward 6-7 months and the product does not heat anymore. I am very disappointed that the manufacturer wants me to send it back to them and pay to have it shipped back. I do not recommend this product to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Regina MBA MSN

customer_reviews.title: Pyle Digital Steam Press
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to have when you want to press your cloth's. I do have some issues. First the steam does not work, not a major issue but that is one reason why I bought it. I also use starch so that does help press the cloths but I really wanted to play around with the steam. Second is that I am always burning my self when flattening the clothes to be pressed. I am using one of my working gloves that I bought to work in my garage so that helps with the burns. Other than those issues, I really like the press.
customer_reviews.author: John Delmont

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 or 5 months, the iron would not get really hot, only warm. After a year the machine stopped working altogether. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: No more unworn shirts
customer_reviews.text: This product makes laundry day a breeze and the blouses and shirts that sat in our closet wrinkled and unworn have made their summer debut. Somehow ironing was a big production but no more. Perfectly pressed and now in rotation!
customer_reviews.author: Clem

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as I thought it would be. It takes a long time to press a pair of men's pants and I even ended up burning a pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now this I like
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought me this as an early birthday present and she does not have to buy me another thing this year!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Jennings$$$

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful piece of technology and a real time saver; I burn through ironing is 1/4 the time. Best quality, easy too use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: works great would suggest they should have a better way to ...
customer_reviews.text: works great would suggest they should have a better way to remove the water before storage
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good piece of equipment. now I pretty much press all my clothes
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: could use a longer table and a better cover. but a over all decent product not too costly.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Too Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Knew the Missus would never bother. Absolute waste of my money. Too complicated to be sustainable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tong

customer_reviews.title: I really like this press
customer_reviews.text: I really like this press. I have always despised ironing with an iron, long and tedious. This product works well and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Thompson

customer_reviews.title: FRIGGING BEEPING NOISE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FRIGGING BEEPING NOISE!!!!! How do you disable that annoying beeping noise???? Please tell me there's a way. I bought this to use with crafts, so I need it to stay closed longer than the beep allows. Someone help me figure out how to get rid of the beeping noise PLEASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Rocked!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my mother this past Christmas! She loves it! As soon as she unwrapped it she screamed and searched for her uniform so she could press it immediately! She's very happy, which in turn pleases me. Great steamer!
customer_reviews.author: LRJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it but I need to get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Moore

product_meta.title: Pyle PSTMP90 Pure Clean Table Top Steam Press with Steam Burst Function, Large Ironing Surface and Adjustable Temperature Selection
product_meta.description: Style Name:Steam PressAchieve professional 'Right from the Dry Cleaners' results when you use the Pyle Pure Clean Steam Press. You'll feel good and look good, when you create long-lasting creases and wrinkle-free clothes 50% faster. The Steam Press surface is 5 times larger than the size of traditional irons so you will be able to steam more, quicker. Features include, non-stick anti-shine iron surface, 'Steam Burst' function that blasts away wrinkles, adjustable temperature selection, 22 x 9-inch press surface and more. Say goodbye to wrinkles with the Pure Clean Steam Press.
feature_bullets: 50% Faster Than Traditional Ironing; Variable Temperature Selection; (5) Times the Size of Regular Irons; 1350 Watt Power
Safe for Nylon, Silk Rayon, Wool, Cotton, Linen, etc.; Multiple Dry-Heat Steam Settings for Different Fabrics; Iron Surface Size: 22" x 9"
Non-Stick and Anti-Shine Ironing Surface Coating; Easy-to-Use and Safe One-Hand Operation; Accessories: Spray Bottle, Press Cushion, Fill Cup
Even Pressure Ensures Sharp, Long-Lasting Creases; Extra Gentle Against Fabrics Like Silk; Auto Shut-Off Safety Feature
Steam Press & Remove Wrinkles; 'Steam Burst' Blasts Away Wrinkles; 10 oz. Refillable Water Tank; Dimensions: 24.0" x 10.2" x 22.0"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars54 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
